pageContext.claim: “They [Democrats] say we're going to raise your taxes, we're going to open borders, everybody can come into the country, we're going to pay for everybody's health insurance, schooling. You know, at one time I've said ‘we're going to get everybody a Rolls-Royce’ and CNN or one of them said ‘they never said, and they never promised a Rolls-Royce, Donald Trump lied tonight.’ I said every illegal alien will have a Rolls-Royce. They said ‘he lied tonight.’ These people are sick.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at various times complained about receiving Pinocchios or being called a liar by CNN for saying undocumented immigrants would receive Rolls-Royces. Actually, the Pinocchios were for his claim that Democrats wanted to give immigrant driver's licenses. We -- and CNN -- noted that he later said he was joking about the luxury cars.
